text: Thomas Bangalter (born 3 January 1975) is a French musician, half of the duo Daft Punk, together with Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo, in the sub-genre known as French House (Filter House/Tekfunk). Category:1975 births Category:French DJs Category:Bass guitarists Category:French record producers Category:Movie score composers Category:Musicians from Paris Category:Living people Category:Singers from Paris
title: Thomas Bangalter
